summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending Section 23.30.010, Zoning Designations Established: Classifications for the purposes of this subtitle; adding a new Section 23.34.014, Locational Criteria - Mobile Home Park Zone; adding a new Chapter 23.43, Residential Mobile Home Park; amending Section 23.84.025, Definitions "M"; amending Section 23.84.032, Definitions "R"; and amending Section 23.84.048, Definitions "Z", of the Seattle Municipal Code.
